meanings.sent1: The softballers practiced their throws at the field.
meanings.sent2: The softballers won the game with a home run.
meanings.sent3: The softballers decided to have a friendly match with the baseball players.
meanings.sent4: The softballers were a force to be reckoned with on the field.
meanings.sent5: The image of the softballers swinging their bats stayed in my mind.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who participate in softball games.
meanings.sent1: All the softballers gathered at the park for the tournament.
meanings.sent2: The softballers cheered for their teammates from the sidelines.
meanings.sent3: The softballers organized a potluck after the game.
meanings.sent4: The softballers formed a strong bond through their shared love for the sport.
meanings.sent5: The field was filled with the laughter of the softballers enjoying the game.
